TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DefaultSettingValueAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DefaultSettingValueAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DefaultSettingValueAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定应用程序设置属性的默认值。

span.span: Specifies the default value for an application settings property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅可以应用于单个设置属性：若要将此特性应用于整个应用程序设置类无效。 can only be applied to individual settings properties; it is invalid to apply this attribute to an entire application settings class. 不同的设置提供程序可能有不同的要求或限制使用。Different settings providers may have different requirements or limitations on the use of the . 例如，不需要此属性，并且将重写提供此属性，如果有任何值的任何值-默认值或用户修改-数据存储区中已存在。For example, the does not require this attribute, and will override any value provided by this attribute if there are any values—default or user-modified— already present in the data store. 需要默认值可以表示为字符串。 requires that the default value can be represented as a string. 因此，使用 XML 序列化的设置不能具有通过此属性指定的默认值。As a result, settings using XML serialization cannot have a default value specified by means of this attribute. 某些提供程序可以选择支持多个可以指定在编译时使用的序列化方案。Some providers may choose to support multiple serialization schemes which can be specified at compile time using the . > [!CAUTION] > 指定此属性的默认值为生成的已编译.exe 或.dll 文件中的纯文本存储。The default values specified by this attribute are stored as plain text in the resultant compiled .exe or .dll file. 因此这些默认值是本质上是不安全的。Therefore these default values are inherently insecure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用于三个的四个属性`FormSettings`包装器类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the applied to three of the four properties of the `FormSettings` wrapper class, which is derived from the class. 此类用于保留位置、 大小、 背景色和窗体的文本。This class is used to persist the location, size, background color, and text of form. 前的三个这些窗体属性具有与之关联的默认值。The first three of these form properties have default values associated with them. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#9)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

span.span: A that represents the default value for the property.
Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所提供的字符串必须是与属性类型关联的可用序列化机制与兼容的值。The supplied string must be a value that is compatible with the available serialization mechanism associated with the property type. 例如，如果该属性属于类型，则`value`的`"Azure"`有效。For example, if the property is of type , then a `value` of `"Azure"` would be valid. > [!CAUTION] > 指定此属性的默认值为生成的已编译.exe 或.dll 文件中的纯文本存储。The default values specified by this attribute are stored as plain text in the resultant compiled .exe or .dll file. 因此这些默认值是本质上是不安全的。Therefore these default values are inherently insecure.

summary.span: 获取应用程序设置属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets the default value for the application settings property.
A that represents the default value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在中设置构造函数。The property is set in the constructor. 设置提供程序可能支持多个可以使用指定的序列化方案。Setting providers may support multiple serialization schemes that can be specified with the .
